titleStmt.title: The Kings noble entertainment at York with the Lord Maior of York his worthy speech to the King. As also the manner how the aldermen, sheriffes, citizens and sundry other gentlemen congratulated His Maiesty to York. Likewise how triumphantly hee was entertained with many rich presents, and now they conducted His Maiesty to his castle. Sent from York by Sir Nathanaael [sic] Rigby to a merchant in London. March 18. 1641.
titleStmt.author: Rigby, Nathaniel, Sir.
